priority_fixes.description: OCR on 'Aadhaar Front copy' is missing postTriggerRuleIds chain to VERIFY rule
priority_fixes.fix: Add postTriggerRuleIds pointing to the VERIFY rule that should execute after OCR

recommendations.description: Panels with lower scores: Address Details, Bank Details, Payment Details, Purchase Organization Details
recommendations.action: Review rule assignment to ensure rules are on correct fields within these panels

recommendations.description: Some field names differ in spelling/capitalization between generated and reference (e.g., 'Aadhaar' vs 'Aaadhar')
recommendations.action: Ensure field names match BUD document exactly to maintain consistency
